block.p: Podcast: Scheduled to appear this week are Tina Brown (above), the author of ''The Diana Chronicles''; Marilyn Stasio on crime fiction; Rachel Donadio on technology and the novel; and Dwight Garner, senior editor, with best-seller news. Sam Tanenhaus, the editor of the Book Review, is the host.
From the Archive: The obituary of Diana, Princess of Wales, the subject of ''The Diana Chronicles.''
First Chapters: Excerpts from ''The Perfect Man,'' by Naeem Murr; ''Long Time Leaving,'' by Roy Blount Jr.; and other books.
Search: A free archive of book reviews since 1981.
Links: Read reviews of the books listed in the Editors' Choice and Paperback Row features.
